mapper.select: SELECT o.orderDate, o.totalPrice, o.creditCard, o.expireDate, o.cardType, o.userId, o.discountCost, o.usedMileage, f.address1, f.address2, f.zip, f.receiverName, f.deliveryNumber, f.deliveryStatus FROM FundOrders f, orders o WHERE f.orderId = #{orderId} AND f.orderId = o.orderId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FundOrders (orderId, address1, address2, zip, receiverName, deliveryNumber, deliveryStatus) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{zip}, #{receiverName}, #{deliveryNumber}, #{deliveryStatus})
